channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Early cancer detection startup Craif raises $22M
item.description: Cancer ranks as one of the top causes of death worldwide. The National Cancer Institute reported nearly 20 million new cancer cases and 9.7 million ca...

item.title: From coding tests to billion-dollar startups, Ali Partovi’s eight-year experiment is paying off
item.description: In Silicon Valley, where the same high-wattage names tend to dominate the headlines, Ali Partovi has long wielded outsized influence despite limited n...

item.title: A New Quantum Algorithm Speeds Up Solving a Huge Class of Problems
item.description: It’s been difficult to find important questions that quantum computers can answer faster than classical machines, but a new algorithm appears to do so...

item.title: Dyson Supersonic r Hair Dryer Review: A Tiny Powerhouse
item.description: The Supersonic r is Dyson on Ozempic—minus the side effects.

item.title: Report finds Meta’s celebrity-voiced chatbots could discuss sex with minors

item.title: Welcome to Chat Haus, the coworking space for AI chatbots

item.title: Parallelle Traveler Review: Unparalleled Attention to Detail
item.description: Designer Annie Fan went through 60 prototypes to get the Traveller to where it is today, and it shows.

item.title: 7 Best Mesh Routers (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Forget about patchy internet connections and dead spots in the house. These WIRED-tested multiroom mesh systems will get you online in no time.

item.title: 9 Best Electric Kettles (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: We made lots of coffee and tea to test these electric kettles—and boiled it down to these top picks.

item.title: 4chan is back online, says it’s been ‘starved of money’
